org.spf4j.net

Class SntpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spf4j.net.SntpClient

  • public final class SntpClient
extends Object
    Simple NTP client. Inspired by Android Sntp client. For how to use, see SntpClientTest.java. https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1361
    Author:
    zoly

      • requestTimeHA

        public static Timing requestTimeHA(int timeoutMillis,
                                   int ntpResponseTimeoutMillis,
                                   String... hosts)
                            throws IOException,
                                   InterruptedException,
                                   TimeoutException
        Request NTP time with retries.
        Parameters:
        hosts - NTP server hosts.
        timeoutMillis - Max time to attempt to get NTP time
        ntpResponseTimeoutMillis - the time after which if we do not receive a response from the NTP server, we consider the call failed (and will retry until timeoutMillis.
        Returns:
        Ntp timing info.
        Throws:
        IOException - - thrown in case of time server connectivity issues.
        InterruptedException - - thrown if exec interrupted.
        TimeoutException

      • requestTime

        public static Timing requestTime(String host,
                                 int port,
                                 long deadlineNanos)
                          throws IOException
        Get NTP time.
        Parameters:
        host - - NTP server host name.
        timeoutMillis - - the socket timeout.
        Returns:
        - NTP server timing info.
        Throws:
        IOException - - thrown in case of time server connectivity issues.

        Parameters:

        timeoutMillis - - the socket timeout.
        Returns:

        Throws:
